body:
Adding explicit docs SGTM.

Or we can add some docs in the package docs. Right now it just says
"Package filepath implements utility routines for manipulating filename
paths in a way compatible with the target operating system-defined file
paths."

Perhaps we should expand on that, and say that all result returned will
contain OS-specific path separator no matter what the input uses on
platforms that accepts both '/' and '\\'.

Another idea is that we just say, using slash separated path is always
correct as input to functions in this package, and the output will be
transformed to use the native path separator.
